isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - POWER TAKE OFF: ROCKWELL REAR ENGINE MOUNTED - CLEAN AND INSPECT - PREVENTING CORROSION AND RUST ON CLEANED PARTS

svcproc.title: PREVENTING CORROSION AND RUST ON CLEANED PARTS
svcproc.para: Apply lubricant to cleaned and dried parts that are not damaged and are to be immediately assembled.
If parts are to be stored, apply a special material that prevents corrosion and rust to all surfaces. Store the parts inside special paper or other material that prevents corrosion and rust.
